channel.title: blog on Shanks' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Shanks' Blog

item.title: 0x5 - First North Sec Experience
item.description: This year was my first ever attendance to the North Sec cyber security event. It is Canada’s largest cyber security event, consisting of 3 parts: the conference, competition (CTF) and trainings, spanning nearly a week. Depending on which package you buy, you will be given various ‘swag’ and other items for the various events. In my case, I bought the early bird conference and competition combo since I was still a student at the time (students got a 50% off promotion code) and wanted to do some networking.

item.title: 0x4 - MagpieCTF 2023 Writeup Standings
item.description: It’s been a few weeks but I received some great news on March 28th 2023. I was one of the three winners for the MagpieCTF 2023 writeups portion. They announced the winners in their Discord server on the announcements channel. This was a big win for me since it was my first time attempting the writeups officially. I hope to bring more writeups in the future and furhter improve my skills to transfer the knowledge that I’ve gained through my experiences with this challenges.

item.title: 0x3 - ISSessions 2023 Standings
item.description: Some cool news came about yesterday. ISSessions had their recap meeting where they released some statistics from the CTF including the top 100 players.

item.title: 0x2 - Note about the Cyber Advent writeups
item.description: In order to help me improve my skills with Hugo, I figured I would mention something regarding the writeups for the Advent of Cyber.

item.title: 0x1 - First post
item.description: This is my first blog post using Hugo. Just getting the hang of this, tinkering around with configs and posts. Let’s hope this goes well.
